The_Validator module

class The_Validator.The_Validator[source]

Bases: object

Validates and converts textual representations of transitions into a structured JSON format. This class specifically handles parsing of deploy and action transitions defined in a textual format and constructs a corresponding JSON object that represents the contract structure.

parse_transition(line)[source]

Parses a single line of text representing a transition into a structured dictionary.

Parameters:

line (str) – A line of text representing a transition.

Returns:

A tuple containing a dictionary representation of the transition and an optional string of state variables declarations (if present).

Return type:

tuple[dict, str]

transitions_to_json(transitions_txt_path, json_output_path)[source]

Converts a text file containing transitions into a structured JSON format.

Parameters:

  • transitions_txt_path (str) – The file path for the text file containing transitions.

  • json_output_path (str) – The output file path for the resulting JSON.

This method reads transitions from a text file, parses them, and constructs a JSON object that represents the entire contract structure including transitions, states, and participants.
